import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Sellbook.css' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Sellbook() { const [bookDetails,setProjectDetails] = useState({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) const handleSell = () => { alert(`console.log('Final State:', bookDetails);`) // Perform form submission logic here // ... // Redirect or show a success message after selling }; return ( <>
